document_data.mainbody:
Fyndrick Dellmon was the youngest son of Kerbin Dellmon during the Elemental Evil crisis.
In 1491 DR, the Iceshield orcs attacked many farms around the Dellmon farm. However, Kerbin refused to abandon his farm and go to Yartar. Fyndrick was worried about the orcs. With the lucky arrival of some adventurers, the Dellmons managed to defend the farm.
